resources.string:
We expect to release a new Cadpage direct paging service in the next few weeks. The web page at www.cadpage.org has the details.

 Luzerne County, PA

 Warren County, VA
 
 General Fixes:
 Crash in General location parser
 Panic fix to suspected problem with user loosing their payment status
